original_text: Then the king went to his palace, and passed the night fasting: neither were instruments of musick brought before him: and his sleep went from him.
korean_text: 왕이 궁에 돌아가서는 밤이 새도록 금식하고 그 앞에 오락을 그치고 잠자기를 마다하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the king went to his palace,
neither were instruments of musick brought before him:
and his sleep went from him.
